name: Zombie Survivors: NY Frontier
description:
Zombie Survivors: NY Frontier War has thrilling zombie shooting challenges of war zombie in which you have to show best zombie shot and dead target towards zombie masters to vanish them in given time. Be prepare for the zombie hunt as there are lot of zombie kings and mutant zombies are ready to assault you with their fury action.
*Key features*
Thrilling missions to shoot all the zombies
Stunning 3D graphics and best audio effects
Be a great zombie hunter to kill mutant zombies
Shoot zombies and save humanity
Be an expert sniper combat shooter
